doc.title: Dora
doc.plot: A story inspired by one of Freud's few unsolved cases - the Viennese genius had to give up, since it was a kind of madness he could not deal with: love. At present times, among Italian Alps. A successful architect parks his daughter Dora at his best friends' chalet. Dora, 15 years old stubborn and passionate. Who cares if she is a bit clumsy and fragile? She wants to learn what love is. But she has chosen the wrong man: her father's best friend. Problems begin when the latter realizes he loves Dora, too.
